p.b: For each day's reading question, write your name, section, table, and group number on the upper right hand corner of your answer and hand it in at the start of class that day

problem.p: (1) Make a chart describing the analogies between the quantities that describe translational and rotational motion. Make your chart as complete as you possibly can.
(2) Write down a problem solving strategy for how you would determine the acceleration of a rolling sphere down an inclined plane using torque and force methods.
